manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SOFT + SILKY Gently cleanse, hydrate and help revive longer or damaged locks with this anti hair breakage shampoo designed to leave hair feeling soft and silky. BREAK UP WITH BREAKAGE Melu may be small but it packs a powerful punch in rejuvenating long or damaged hair, strengthening strands with an anti-breakage elasticizing action. LENTIL SEED EXTRACT Formulated with Lentil Seed Extract from the farm of Mr. Francesco Di Gesu in Villalba, Caltanissetta, Italy. SHINE BRIGHT Every Essential Haircare product is specially formulated to deliver long-lasting fragrance, incredible shine and the ultimate silky-smooth finish.

MELU Shampoo MELU Heat Shield MELU Conditioner Gentle Protection Elasticizing anti-breakage shampoo for long or damaged hair Hydrate While Protecting Shield all types of hair from stress caused by straightener or blow dryer Long Hair Rescue Conditioning action moisturizes the hair, nourishes the ends preventing breakage Cleanse and Add Shine Designed to gently cleanse the hair, making it shiny and silky Long Hair Ally Conditioning antistatic action that adds softness and shine Weightless Design Light formula makes the hair smooth and soft without weighing it down Zero Impact Ethos Obtained with 100% clean energy in recyclable packaging Protecting Biodiversity Contains active ingredient, Lentil Extract - part of the Slow Food Presidia Beauty for You and the Planet 100% of the energy we use to manufacture our products in Italy is renewable

NOUNOU is Nourishing! Transformative Gel-to-Oil Products for hair loss Give new life to hair Products for your best blonde! Infused with Roucou Oil Deep cleansing and restoring Nourishing and sustaining hair For defined, hydrated curls Stimulating the scalp and hair Restorative mask Gently cleanse and clarify For softness and shine! Suitable Hair Type Hair with product build up Processed and damaged hair Curly to coily hair Fine and fragile hair Damaged hair needing refreshed Natural or cosmetic blondes All hair types

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Repaired my hair without weighing it down
reviews.reviewText: My stylist recommended the shampoo and conditioner when I came in after a year of seeing another stylist because my hair was dry and was breaking and tangling all the time. After using the entire product my hair is repaired, soft, full (I have fine hair, but I have a lot of hair), and shiny. I ordered it again, this time through Amazon and there is no notable difference. I have the scent a 4. It smells good, but if I could pick the scent it wouldn’t be the scent that it is, but it’s not strong so it doesn’t compete with my perfume.If you have long hair that is in need of repair use the entire product (lasted me about 6 months). Then go back to something else if you prefer and later this in between washes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price - never going back!
reviews.reviewText: Yeah, it was hard to pay this much for such a small amount, but I'm learning that quality in small doses is better than trash in large doses. Sure you can get hair care for a fraction of the price, but that's because it's loaded with cheap ingredients- many of which are harmful. I will never go back from Davines.My hair is long and fine, and so it damages easily, and tangles easily. I don't have an overly oily scalp, but it does get oily after a couple days. Unlike many super "natural" shampoos I've tried (from Whole Foods and other natural stores) MELU actually gets the oil out. And unlike the cheap shampoos full of chemicals, it doesn't feel like it's stripping the all the living nutrients out of my hair as it removes the excess oil. MELU leaves it soft and workable, but not heavy.I love it!It's definitely worth the price, and if used sparingly (you don't even need to use much) it'll last you 2-3 months easy. So the price evens out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars and assumed that like everything else I had previously used on my hair ...
reviews.reviewText: I read so many reviews on this shampoo (as well as the conditioner), and assumed that like everything else I had previously used on my hair (Goldwell, Kerastase, Oribe, etc.), that it was just another overpriced hair care line with a catchy look. I WAS WRONG! To be safe, I ordered the travel sizes of the shampoo and conditioner, along with a sample of the Nounou mask. I figured, it's Amazon Prime and the small sizes are safe to try it out. These are things that I wanted to specify, because they were not originally specified for me:- You get many uses out of the travel sizes, and a little really does go a long way. I have long hair past the middle of my back, and find that a quarter-size amount is plenty.-If you want a good lather with the shampoo, make sure your hair is very, very wet. I wash my hair everyday, sometimes twice a day, and have gotten about 15 uses out of each product, and there is still some left.This has literally TRANSFORMED my hair in the past two weeks, as I normally color my hair black once a month. I normally have oily hair with dry ends. My hair no longer feels oily, and my ends are extremely smooth and soft, and much less tangled than they were. My hair also feels like it has a lot more volume, and when I blowdry ... My hair is perfection (I air dry most days) . I am on my way to ordering the larger sizes of these products, and my next goal is to try the Davines OI All In One Milk. I can't stop touching my hair and neither can my boyfriend! I'm so glad I tried this!

reviews.reviewText: Love that this has clean ingredients and makes my hair feel clean and soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My hair is thick and it feels so healthy after a wash!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is a Fantastic shampoo. I love the consistency & smell. I have medium thick, semi long hair & a little goes a long way w/this shampoo, thank goodness, because the bottle is pretty small for the price you pay. I have noticed an improvement in the thickness of my hair & the length, which is what I was going for. Not as many split ends which means less trimming which means longer hair! When you are achieving the results you were shooting for, it's always worth the $$. I highly recommend & I am one picky consumer.

reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo - this was the real product and not a dupe.

reviews.reviewText: I have used Melu for mega years. It may be a bit pricey but you get what you pay for.
